website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a portable laptop charger that leads the pack in reliability, warranty length, and customer support, this is an excellent choice.
pros: Delivers 23000mAh of power in a three-device charging unit for a mid-range price
Impressive two-year limited warranty and 24-hour customer service
cons: Very rare reports of faulty units and short battery life

customer_reviews.title: This powers my Bass amplifier!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to power my Phil Jones Bass Double Four Mini Bass amplifier. It's not it's primary function but it had the right voltage and the large capacity so I use it to power my amp when I plug my UBass and play for my church choir every week. A single charge easily lasts me six Sunday mass performances. I'm sure it can power your other gadgets too. Hahaha!!! Must buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Spanky3

customer_reviews.title: unit works well, in spite of poorly writen instructions and confusing adapters.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Poweradd Pilot Pro2 23000mAh Power Bank to use on the plane for long flights. The unit is a tad heavy, but works very well. During a several hour flight, it's power cell meter barely dropped and operated my laptop as if it were plugged into a wall outlet. - I would have given it 5 stars, if it were not for the initial set up of the unit to charge it. The cords and instructions are not user friendly or necessarily logical. At first, I was unable to figure out how to charge or interpret the screen and was nearly ready to return it, but later figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Porter

customer_reviews.title: Does excellent job keeping my Dell powered
customer_reviews.text: This really does a good job keeping my Dell laptop powered. I like it also because it light and portable. It's flat shape makes it easy to fit in my bag. The battery lasts about 3 hours which is great and what I need. What I like most is that it remembers my voltage setting for each use, so I do not have to keep setting it(other brands do not have this behavior) A++
customer_reviews.author: dman

customer_reviews.title: Works for my bass amp too!
customer_reviews.text: I also use this for my Phil Jones Double four bass amplifier. (The best ever for busking). Works perfectly with no hum. I can now play bass on the street as long as I want, and sound great, and it all fits easily on my scooter! I can't think how it could work any better!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Parfitt

customer_reviews.title: Ran my laptop over 2 hours without switching over to laptop battery
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to power a laptop out in the field. Normally have 2 cameras constantly running which kills my battery. The laptop only lasts about 1&1/2 hours which is no good. I used this battery and got over 2 hours without ever switching to the laptops battery.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cuccia

customer_reviews.title: That's some tasty juice.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to power my ZOOM F8 recorder, using this cable:  I tried to run a test to see how long this battery would last, but it simply wouldn't die. I left the Zoom recording all day (one mic, Phantom/48v on) and after 12 hours, the Pilot Pro2 battery level was at 56%. That's some tasty juice. The battery has just about the same footprint as the Zoom f8, so the two pair nicely on a table top, or in the bag. I didn't want to deal with NP/sony style batteries, sleds, etc., and wanted more flexibility at a lower price point...This seems to be it!
customer_reviews.author: ZetaOmega

customer_reviews.title: Works for Universal Audio Apollo x4.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to power a Universal Audio UA Apollo x4. Is working well for that but the display doesn’t always come on when I expect it to. Would buy again but would buy the bigger model that just became available. Just wish it had Thunderbolt power as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Morris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Music!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to power my amp. It's has a tons of power and battery life and I like how you can choose different voltages for different applications! If you like to jam where there's no power, this battery will make it so!
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Vester

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting charge, rapid recharge. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I use this battery to operate my e-spinner, electric spinning wheel. It allows me to utilize the spinner independent of electrical outlets. It will spin all day on one charge Thus it is totally portable. The battery is also thin and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchased. And after 3 months it will not charge or take a charge. I will be sending back for credit this purchase is less than amazing spending good money on crap that failed second time. Don’t buy if you need something reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Sageser

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Charges my iPad the tiniest bit slowly, but with a charge of only about 50% charged the iPad to around 30%, which is impressive. Takes a while to charge but not an issue if charged overnight. USB ports make it very compatible with all devices. Overall, keeps charge for a long time while not in use and great charger when in use. Great value, too.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Braden

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and compact power bank
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this power bank. It is great for charging USB items like phones and it also does a great job of powering a laptop. I find I can at least double my laptop run time. It is small enough to be able to take on airplanes but powerful enough to be very useful. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Exemplary Customer Support

But this review is not about the product. It's about Poweradd's exemplary customer support. Poweradd took both of the batteries I had purchased back and gave me a full refund plus shipping costs. These guys stand by their product. Buy with confidence!

customer_reviews.title: Powers Surface Well, Was Replaced Easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost a year ago, and for about 10 months it powered my Surface Pro 4 and smart phone well. I travel 2-3 times a month, so it was getting very frequent use and holding up well. Then a couple months ago, I noticed that it could no longer hold a charge. I notified the seller, and after just a couple simple email responses, they let me return it for a brand new one that came quickly and works great again.
